Sort by Date.description: The user wants to see the transactions sorted by date.
input: click on 'View All Transactions' button or double click on a specific bank account from the Account List view
click on the attribute 'Date' one time to sort in ascending order or two times for descending order
output: The transactions list is sorted in ascending or descending date order
